short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: App to control Apple Music, Spotify, SoundCloud and Amazon Music Media Player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: iShuffle is a remote controller for your favorite music players. You can control Apple Music, Spotify, SoundCloud and Amazon Music as well as YouTube.
